name: Alien Invasion (itch) (Ghina Al Halabi)
description:
A good vs evil with a twist of sugar..

An alien accidentally finds himself in an opposing planet and decides to take over in order to further his agendas of evil. He lost his powers due to the goodness of the planet and the only way to regain them is by destroying it.
___________________________________
This game is a very short game, that might be expanded or worked on in the future as it was a university project with the theme "You are the villian".
